name: Air Hockey - Ice to Glow Age
name_original: Air Hockey - Ice to Glow Age
description:
Discover a new amazing air hockey game and take a journey through history. Hit the ice and choose the battle field you prefer. Challenge yourself with 4 different difficulty levels against a virtual adversary or challenge to duel a friend of yours.
This game works like a classic air hockey table game but it will bring you even more fun. It has incredibly realistic physics, a cool graphic style and you can change the color of the pads or the puck with just a couple of touches.

How to play: Use your finger to move the paddle and hit the puck to score goals.

Features:
- Colorful graphics.
- Smooth and responsive game play.
- Realistic physics.
- 2-player mode (on the same device).
- Quick play mode (single player).
- Camera positioning (only in single player mode)
- 5 hockey fields: Ice age, middle ages, modern times, futuristic glow age
- 4 difficulty levels: Easy medium, hard and pro.
- 8 selectable paddles and pucks.
- Phone vibrates when the puck is being hit or by score / goal


This game is has been designed to entertain you if you like it please rate it with 5 stars on the app store.
